body.name: Granitestone Cookware 12” Nonstick Pan for Cooking & Frying, Mineral Enforced Egg Pan with Stay Cool Handles, Dishwasher Safe Cooking with No Warp Technology, 100% PFOA Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 10 mins
features: Multipurpose Pan: Rely on this this frying pan for your everyday cooking needs. Stir fry foods, cook eggs, braise and sear meats, or anything else you’d like while the nonstick coating ensures an easy release and throw it in the dishwasher for a quick cleanup.

Ultra-Nonstick Fry Pan: Spend less time with clean up with the Granitestone nonstick pan- This pan is coated 3 times with ultra-nonstick technology, preventing any liquids or foods from sticking to your pan when cooking or frying – while still getting a perfect cook and delicious crisp.
Healthy & Nontoxic: The Granitestone pan uses a mineral based coating allowing this frying pan to be free of PFOA, PFOS, lead & cadmium - ensuring an eco-friendly and healthy cooking experience.

Quick and Easy Cleanup: The Granitestone pan is completely dishwasher safe, allowing you to spend less time with cleanup after use. Simply throw your pan in the dishwasher after using and enjoy the effortless cleanup.
Metal Utensil Safe: Metal utensils, whisks, and eggbeaters won't damage the durable, triple-layer, nonstick interior of the frying pan so you can simply do all your cooking needs inside the pan.
Oven Safe Up To 500 Degrees: The Frying Pan is oven safe up to 500 degrees providing an option for you to cook anything you’d like in the oven or in on the stove.

Evenly Cooked Meals: Avoid any raw or uncooked parts of foods while enjoying consistently cooked foods with the pans even heat technology - Created from a single, stamped aluminum plate, the heat is quickly dispersed through the entire pan.
Super Durable and No Warp: The Granitestone frying pan avoids any heat induced warping when heated to extremely high temperatures, ensuring you will receive years of outstanding use.
body.description: Stone Rock Pan is the best dish you will ever use for cooking, singing and notwithstanding heating. Squeezed from strong aluminum plate for even warmth conduction and afterward covered multiple times with our tough stone shake complete which makes for unrivaled cooking that just won?t stick. What's more, with our 500 degrees stove evaluated container, heating with your Granite Rock is a straightforwardness. It?s PFOA free, dishwater safe and no or little margarine or oil is required for even the stickiest cooking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great pan, but the handle is uncomfortable to hold!
reviews.reviewText: The nonstick aspect of this pan is excellent, and I more than enjoy being able to use metal utensils in it. However, the handle is flat and not cylindrical like what is shown in the picture. The flat handle makes the pan uncomfortable to hold — other than that, I would've given it 5 stars instead of the 4-star rating that I gave it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible, Terrible, Terrible
reviews.reviewText: I think this is by far the worst non stick pan I have ever purchased. I have used it twice and have been "under-impressed" by it's performance. This morning, I lightly burned a sausage patty and for the life of me, I can't get the marks out of the pan. Absolutely horrible product and I would not recommend it.
